metadata.title: CVE-2022-1508 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s io_uring modulein the way a user triggers the io_read() function with some specialparameters. This flaw allows a local user to read some memory out ofbounds.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
